laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive for Ampicillin-sensitive Escherichia coli, leukocytosis (leukocyte count 9 cells/L), neutrophil count 9, platelet count 9.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: E. coli was isolated from blood cultures despite 18 days of appropriate antibiotic therapy.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) was isolated from blood culture and a central line tip.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: MRSA was isolated again from additional blood cultures over the next 3 weeks, despite ongoing antibiotic therapy.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Pseudomonas aeruginosa was isolated from blood culture.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Pseudomonas aeruginosa grew on 8 separate blood cultures during the next 11 days following the initial infection.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Blood cultures positive for Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Recurrent bacteremia with Pseudomonas aeruginosa after a new TIPS stent placement.
